articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As Bitcoin gears up for its next big recovery, meme coins like Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) are poised for explosive growth. While SHIB has experienced its share of ups and downs, recent events have shaken its holders. However, market experts believe that both Shiba Inu and Mpeppe (MPEPE) are on the verge of significant gains, with Bitcoin’s recovery acting as the catalyst. Let’s explore why holding these two meme coins could turn early adopters into millionaires in the coming months.
 
Shiba Inu’s Recent Setback: The Indodax Hack 
Shiba Inu (SHIB) holders have had a rough time lately. In a shocking turn of events, one of the largest Indonesian crypto exchanges, Indodax, was hacked, leaving many SHIB investors in disarray. The attack led to the theft of 9 billion SHIB, part of a bro…
articles.title: Here’s Why Bitcoins Bounce Back Will Make Shiba Inu and Mpeppe Holders Millionaires

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
In the unpredictable world of cryptocurrencies, only a few tokens can demonstrate resilience during bear markets. Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) have shown their ability to not only survive but thrive even when the market sentiment is down. As traders and investors navigate through the bearish trends, these two meme coins are emerging as essential holdings for those looking to capitalize on potential gains when the market rebounds.
 
Shiba Inu (SHIB) Surges Amid Whale Activity 
Shiba Inu (SHIB) has always been a favorite in the meme coin space, and despite market challenges, it continues to attract attention, especially from whales. Recently, SHIB saw a surge of 4% as whale activity spiked, signaling a potential bullish breakout. According to data, SHIB gained 2.19% in value in the pa…
articles.title: Shiba Inu and Mpeppe Two Bearish Market Resilient Cryptocurrencies You Must Hold

Uniswap (UNI) Price Prediction for 2024

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As the cryptocurrency market continues to evolve, Shiba Inu (SHIB) whales are making moves that signal exciting prospects for the broader Shiba Inu ecosystem and other emerging tokens like Mpeppe (MPEPE). In a new wave of activity, Shiba Inu whales have shifted their attention toward Mpeppe, a meme-based casino token that could offer SHIB-like gains in 2024. With whale transactions soaring and the rise of Play2Earn platforms like Shiba Shootout, both tokens are setting themselves up for substantial growth.
 
Shiba Inu Whale Activity: A Sign of Big Moves Ahead? 
Over the past few weeks, Shiba Inu (SHIB) has seen significant whale activity, with nearly 1.9 trillion SHIB tokens being traded in a 24-hour period. Whale transactions, which involve large quantities of a cryptocurrency, are often …

articles.author: Ronaldo Marquez
articles.description:
The XRP price experienced a notable upswing on Thursday, reaching a three-week high of $0.588, propelled by crypto asset manager Grayscale, as it initiating steps towards the launch of an XRP ETF 
 
Potential Path For To ETF Approval
 
In a strategic move announced on Thursday, Grayscale unveiled the United States’ maiden XRP trust, designed as a “closed-end” fund targeted at accredited investors seeking direct exposure to XRP. 
 
 
While both a trust and an ETF represent distinct investment vehicles, the regulatory requirements and target investor base differ significantly. Notably, an ETF necessitates approval from the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) as it caters directly to retail investors. 
 
Conversely, a trust, aimed at accredited investors, undergoes a less stringent regul…
articles.title: XRP Price Jumps 8% As Grayscale Introduces First Fund, ETF Speculation Grows

articles.author: Ronaldo Marquez
articles.description:
The US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Chair Gary Gensler, known for his skeptical stance towards the crypto industry, is under investigation by Republican lawmakers. 
 
The investigation, led by Representatives Jim Jordan, Patrick McHenry, and James Comer, centers on allegations of political favoritism in the SEC’s hiring practices.
 
SEC Hiring Scandal
 
In the letter addressed to Gensler, the lawmakers highlighted an email correspondence made public in an SEC rulemaking comment, which suggested that the hiring of Dr. Haoxiang Zhu, the SEC Director of Trading and Markets, may have been influenced by his political affiliation. 
 
 
According to the lawmakers, Dr. Zhu emailed Gensler on May 18, 2021, affirming his ideological suitability for the role, stating, “I believe I’m in th…
articles.title: Pro-Crypto Lawmakers Probe SEC Chair Gensler Over Alleged Political Bias

The prices of Dogecoin, Shiba Inu, and PEPE have been on the come-up as the Bitcoin price has recovered. However, at this time, all of their profitability levels remain different, meaning investors in these meme coins are seeing varying levels of profit and losses. In this report, we compare the profitability levels of these three meme coins, in a bid to figure out which has been the best investment based on return on investment.
 
Dogecoin Profitability Remains Highest
 
As the largest meme coin in the market, the Dogecoin price has often set the tone for how investors are looking at meme coins. This often means a rally for Dogecoin can often spread to the other meme coins and trigger a market-wide meme coin rally. As a result, it remains the top choice for meme coin investors.
 
 
In lin…
articles.title: Dogecoin Vs. Shiba Inu Vs. PEPE: How Do The Profitability Levels Stack Up?
